scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: An agreement of local property owners to pay for the cost of paving Fulton Street between Middagh and Pierrepont Streets in Brooklyn, N.Y., dated December 15, 1841. Surnames include Nostrand, Sprague, March, Waring, Titus, Murphy, Price, Trotter, Garrison, White, Lewis, Hall, Gault, Smith, Willoughby, Richardson, Dean, and Bergen. Institutions include 1st Presbyterian Church and St. Ann's Church.
